title: Navi - V1
description: This discord bot was created for Devnics' relaunch. It was coded within 2 weeks as it was required quickly.
- Commissions System using Modals and Select Menus

title: Team Zentech
description: This discord bot was created for Team Zentech/Cubix Services/Team Madrex as an almost automated process manager.
- Commissions System (Quoting, Questions, Ignoring), Applications System, Support System
- Details for tickets would be displayed and updated in channel topics.
This was made over 2 years ago. At that time, it was one of my most challenging tasks.
However, since then I have created and maintained much more complicated and bigger systems.

title: Devnics - V1
description: This bot was created for Devnics Services as a simplistic solution to allow Commission/Application creation and management.
